DOC.HEADLINE: ORANGE COUNTY FOCUS : CYPRESS ; CLASSIC CARS WILL BE DISPLAYED AT CHURCH
DOC.TEXT: As part of its Father ' s Day celebration , Grace Church will display classic cars at the church plaza Sunday from 8 a.m. to noon . More_than 25 vintage cars , bikes and trucks will be_on display . The automobiles will range from models in the early 1900s to a 1994 Viper . The church , at 5100 Cerritos Ave. , will conduct Father ' s Day services at 8:30 and 10:15 a.m .
